meanings.definition: The state of being disordered or chaotic.
meanings.sent1: The disorderedness of the room made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent2: The disorderedness of the files made it difficult to locate the important documents.
meanings.sent3: The disorderedness of the party decorations gave the room a whimsical charm.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a disorderedness of emotions, swirling and colliding like a storm.
meanings.sent5: The disorderedness of the traffic jam was a sight to behold, with cars going in all directions.
